title: West country journey
creator_credit: Edgar H. Anstey, British Transport Films and Syd Sharples
brief_description: Shows examples of scenery and features which give the counties of Devon and Cornwall their attractive character. Includes the multi-colored pattern of the Devon countryside; the rivers, moors, old historic buildings at Totnes, Dartmouth and Exeter; tiny ports and naval docks at Devonport and the long sandy beaches of Cornwall. Photography by Ronald Craigen.
